Thu Dec 28 03:13:44 PM UTC 2023
🐚 sudo install -d /opt/bin
🐚 sudo ln -sf /opt/package/tree-2.1.1/bin/tree /opt/bin/tree
🐚 sudo install -d /opt/share
🐚 sudo install -d /opt/share/man
🐚 sudo install -d /opt/share/man/man1
🐚 sudo ln -sf /opt/package/tree-2.1.1/share/man/man1/tree.1 /opt/share/man/man1/tree.1
